nodes.text: Sanin was a Human male who served as an Equipment Commendations Vendor on Hoth during the Galactic War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Sanin appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Sanin was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
